For the price I paid for for the quality of the shirt was really bad and material felt really bad but it did look good but like the fabric is really cheap

i love it so much it like snatches my waist cause it’s swimsuit material and it’s like double lined almost so you don’t have to wear a bra with it unless you have big boobs then you probably should but like live life on the edge yk it’s whatever
Comfortable and flattering
Love the fabric! Stretchy but fitting. Great price! Gonna order another in various colors

I’m 5’4, 178lbs, 36b, and ordered a size small. It does fit well and feels very good quality. It is a bit stretchy and double lined so you don’t have to wear a bra (but I still did).  The only thing is the little band that goes over the boob area is too small for my boobs (with a bra on) but just barely too small. I bought this for a Halloween costume photoshoot (Mia Mignonette Thermapolis Renaldi, Princess of Genovia) so it wasn’t a huge deal. I definitely was able to fit in the small but I wasn’t sure if I should have gone with the medium or small, so that’s my fault. Without a bra on, the band fits perfectly over the boob. I think it a great value for the quality you get. It is flattering! Overall, highly recommend.
This is by far my favorite top I have owned. Great material, super comfy, perfect length, and works with any outfit. The double lining on the chest works as a bra too. I love this so much.
Fit true to size and the cut was very flattering. Good quality and softness.
It fits very well, and the quality is really good
obsessed with this top! very comfortable and flattering. not see through at all because of the double layered fabric on the bust

This is made from synthetic fibers NOT cotton. I only bought bc the description was misleading. Shirt is cute though
I can’t wait to wear it.  The fold over layers are great for coverage.
The perfect quality! It’s super cute tucked in or untucked. I loved this shirt so much I bought in in 2 other colors. If you love a strapless shirt this is the one for you
Super cute basic. It’s true to size and color.

评论概述: Very cute but see through in the back.

I think this will tend to be a hit or miss for people. My gf (5'1", 110 lbs) got a small and it fits, but we don't really love it. It's ok. Also don't love the material. It's like what a bikini is made of. For some body types it will DEFINITELY work better than others, but it's difficult because it's hard to pin that down. I'm not just talking about thin vs. heavy. Anyway, it's ok.

Nice fit and very good quality. Material is very thick and comfortable
Im obsessed. I need in other colors. I love the material- great quality- and i like how its not super cropped

I got the blue navy color and the color was beautiful. It complimented me so much and it’s one of my favorite shirts I got from Amazon and the quality is very nice. This top is exactly as pictured and looks amazing!

I think I might be wearing it a bit wrong in the phot but I cannot rave enough about the quality of the material, silky softness, and the stiching is fantastic!  Fits very nice in length and hugs your body the right way :)

The texture of the shirt is more of an athletic/bathing suit material. Also the color is a little different than the picture, it’s more burgundy than red. The fit is also tight, but cute. I just need to figure out how to style it. Still deciding if I want to return it or not.

评论概述: This is such a staple in my closet now, it sits like a glove.

评论概述: this is the best tube top ever!
评论详情: this tube top is honestly so good. its quite thick and sturdy material overall (double lines) so it doesnt show your lumps and bumps clearly and smooths you out. the chest portion is even more thick, so it is a bit more supportive. however, you would still need nipple covers if you need that coverage. the length is longer than a crop top, but not too long. its perfect!! color is amazing too. cant wait to wear!

This shirt fit well. I didn’t love the fold over flat on the top of the shirt. It would be better if the shirt was solid but I do understand that it’s giving a Y2K feel.

Got this for the wife. Order to size, it fits just right. The color matches the description. The overall design of the tube top is flattering with small slits on the sides. It compliments a curvy body type as well. Overall, great quality, fit and is comfortable to wear.
such a cute shirt, i was afraid to buy it because there are no pictures but this is what it looks like ! it’s SOOO cute and double layered on the top
